issue.title: [R] add ubuntu 21.04 to nightly builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13199](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13199). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Folks are starting to install from 21.04, so we should check that that works.

comments.body:
